# King of Cards

| rev2      = Q
| rev2Score =
| rev3      = This Is Fake DIY

| rev4      = Uncut

}}
King of Cards is the fourth studio album from British singer-songwriter Tom McRae, released on 14 May 2007. On 16 February 2007, all the tracks on King of Cards were made available for streaming on McRae's official website.
Track listing
# "Set the Story Straight"
# "Bright Lights"
# "Got a Suitcase, Got Regrets"
# "Keep Your Picture Clear"
# "Houdini and the Girl"
# "Sound of the City"
# "On and On"
# "Deliver Me"
# "One Mississippi"
# "The Ballad of Amelia Earhart"
# "Lord, How Long?"
